metadata.name: Eldridge Library
metadata.description:
The Eldridge Library of Ancient Lore is the largest magical library in Great Britain. It is home to some of the rarest and most dangerous tomes, such as the Nightshade Manuscript and the Lowenbruck Dictionary of Curses. It's rumored that the Mordax Archives exist somewhere in its many rooms, but that's probably just a rumor. Probably...

The Eldridge Library is notable for being built around a mysterious white-barked tree, called the "Eldridge Elm" by most students. Despite the name, its exact species is not known, and several reading nooks, bookshelves, and stairways have appeared in its trunk and branches over the years. It's not known exactly how they came to be.
